ai-ds2.1.7:73.15_0: The eight great bases of psychic power
ai-ds2.1.7:74.2_0: At whatever time they develop the path of rebirth in the realm of luminous form ...
ai-ds2.1.7:74.2_1: at that time they enter and remain in the first absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:74.4_0: For him, quite secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities, he has a bad deeds ...
ai-ds2.1.7:74.4_1: at that time they enter and remain in the first absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:74.5_0: These are the things without consequences.
ai-ds2.1.7:75.2_0: At whatever time, as the placing of the mind and keeping it connected are stilled, they enter and remain in the second absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:75.6_0: at that time they enter and remain in the fifth absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:75.8_0: With the giving up of that wholesome deeds, the result of past deeds,
ai-ds2.1.7:75.8_1: at that time they enter and remain in the fifth absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:75.9_0: These are the things without consequences.
ai-ds2.1.7:76.2_0: When it comes to a time when they develop the perception of form in the dimension of infinite space ...
ai-ds2.1.7:76.2_1: at that time they enter and remain in the fourth absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:76.4_0: And so, going totally beyond perceptions of form, with the ending of perceptions of impingement, not focusing on perceptions of diversity, aware that ‘space is infinite’, they have given up and attended to the dimension of infinite space ...
ai-ds2.1.7:76.4_1: at that time they enter and remain in the fourth absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:76.5_0: These are the things without consequences.
ai-ds2.1.7:77.2_0: When it comes to the dimension of infinite space ...
ai-ds2.1.7:77.2_1: at that time they enter and remain in the fourth absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:77.4_0: And so, going totally beyond the dimension of infinite space, aware that ‘there is nothing at all’, they have been reborn in the dimension of infinite consciousness. ...
ai-ds2.1.7:77.4_1: at that time they enter and remain in the fourth absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:77.5_0: These are the things without consequences.
ai-ds2.1.7:78.2_0: When they develop the path totally beyond the dimension of infinite consciousness, aware that ‘there is nothing at all’, they develop the dimension of nothingness ...
ai-ds2.1.7:78.2_1: at that time they enter and remain in the fourth absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:78.4_0: And so, going totally beyond the dimension of infinite space, aware that ‘there is nothing at all’, they have been reborn in the dimension of nothingness. ...
ai-ds2.1.7:78.4_1: at that time they enter and remain in the fourth absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:78.5_0: These are the things without consequences.
ai-ds2.1.7:79.2_0: When it comes to a time in the dimension of nothingness, they develop the perception of the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception. ...
ai-ds2.1.7:79.2_1: at that time they enter and remain in the fourth absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:79.4_0: And so, going totally beyond the dimension of nothingness, aware that ‘there is nothing at all’, they have been reborn in the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception. ...
ai-ds2.1.7:79.4_1: at that time they enter and remain in the fourth absorption ...
ai-ds2.1.7:79.5_0: These are the things without consequences.
ai-ds2.1.7:79.6_0: (They are) unshakable to the formless realms.
